actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To provide that no Federal financial assistance in any form may be provided to investigate the anti-progesterone steroid (known as RU-468) for approval under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.

summary.text: Prohibits the provision of any form of Federal financial assistance for investigation of the anti-progesterone steroid (known as RU-486) to obtain its approval under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act. (Such steroid has been used outside the United States to abort pregnancies.)

titles.title: To provide that no Federal financial assistance in any form may be provided to investigate the anti-progesterone steroid (known as RU-468) for approval under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.
